body:
Tw-impress
============

A web application developed to search tweets (#tags) on twitter and display top 10 tweets in flashy, cool and appealing way using YUI and impress.js

Developed by:
	Ravi Shankar
	Srikanth K Murali
	Chethan S N

Created for Yahoo! Open Hack India 2012

Supported Browser:
	Mozilla, Safari and Webkit based browser.
tagline: YUI and impress.js based twitter hash tag search web application.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: Tw-impress
